div.p: REJOINDER in law, is the defendant’s anſwer to the plaintiff’s replication or reply. Thus, in the court of chancery, the defendant puts in an anſwer to the plaintiff’s bill, which is ſometimes alſo called an exception ; the plaintlſſ’s anfwer to that is called a replication, and the defendant’s anfwer to that a rejoindre.
